import React, {Component} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './Pokemon.module.css' import {TYPE_COLOR} from './PokemonConstants' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import * as actions from '../../store/actions/index' class Pokemon extends Component { componentDidMount(){ console.log(this.props.params.id) this.props.onLoadPokemon(this.props.match.params.id) } render(){ return (
{this.state.id}
{this.state.types.map((type) => ( {type.toLowerCase().split(' ').map(letter => letter.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + letter.substring(1))} )) }

{this.state.name.toLowerCase().split(' ').map(letter => letter.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + letter.substring(1))}

{this.state.stats.map((stat,key) =>

{stat.stat.name}

{stat.base_stat}
)}

Attributes

Height: {this.state.height}

Weight: {this.state.weight}

Abilities {this.state.abilities.map((ability,key) =>{ return

{ability.ability.name}

})}

Base Experience: {this.state.base_experience}

) } } const mapStateToProps = state =>{ return { pkm : state.pokemon.pokemon } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { onLoadPokemon: (id) => dispatch(actions.fetchPokemonById(id)), } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Pokemon)
